Module kivakit.network.email
Package com.telenav.kivakit.network.email

Class EmailMessageAlarm

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.alarms.BaseMessageAlarm
com.telenav.kivakit.network.email.EmailMessageAlarm
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageAlarm, Listener, Transceiver, RegistryTrait, Receiver, Transmitter, NamedObject
public abstract class EmailMessageAlarm extends BaseMessageAlarm implements RegistryTrait
When triggered, sends the email composed by composeEmail(Rate) using a registered EmailSender implementation.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • composeEmail

      public abstract Email composeEmail​(Rate rate)
      Composes the alarm email to send. For example: 
      return new Email()
 .from(shibo)
 .subject("Alarm!")
 .addTo(shibo)
 .body(new EmailBody("Error rate is " + rate));
      Returns:
      The email to send
